Name: ProMV-Music-Video-Maker
About the game: ProMV-Music-Video-Maker uses a variety of visualization techniques to convert musics to videos. So you can experience the music in a new way. ProMV-Music-Video-Maker is an easy-to-use music video creator, an audio visualization tool that allows you to produce great music video in a very fast way. It is very useful for people wanting to publish music on websites like youtube. Supported music formats: mp3, m4a, wav, wma, flac, aac, ac3, aiff, amr, ape, au, mka ,, oga, ogg, etc.
